scripts.dev: turbo run build && concurrently -n packages,demo "bun run dev:packages" "bun run dev:demo"
scripts.dev:packages: concurrently -n shared,server,client,integration "bun run --filter astro-grab-shared dev" "bun run --filter astro-grab-server dev" "bun run --filter astro-grab-client dev" "bun run --filter astro-grab dev"
scripts.link:packages: for dir in packages/*; do (cd "$dir" && bun link); done
